overview: When a beautiful female Genie escapes from her bottle, a young man's life gets turned upside down in this frenetic erotic fable. It seems that the Genie yearns to experience everything that she's missed while locked away inside her bottle -- including sizzling sexual satisfaction! She promises her 'master' his every carnal desire -- just as long as he's willing to help her live out her own. Fleshly pleasure has no bounds in this garden of sensual delights. Director Ron Jeremy has crafted a scorching little sexvid here, filled with delirious action and more than a touch of his trademark wacky humor. And with sultry sirens like Amber Lynn and Sahara on hand, he's got all the tasty talent he needs!
title: Cock-Tales
